DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[view_journeys] AS SELECT JOURNEY_REF, STATUS, DESPATCH_NO, TIMESLOT, LOCATION_ID_TO, DATE_UPDATED, LOAD_TYPE, LOAD_TYPE_DESC, HAULIER, convert(varchar(25), timeslot, 120) + LEFT(ISNULL(LOAD_TYPE,'') + SPACE(10), 10) + LEFT(ISNULL(LOAD_TYPE_DESC,'') + SPACE(20), 20) + LEFT(ISNULL(HAULIER,'') + SPACE(20), 20) AS DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.APP_JOURNEY WHERE STATUS = 'Unassigned' AND JOURNEY_REF <> 'NO JOURNEY'
